title: President Obama to Celebrate Father’s Day | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 11, 2010

 



President Obama to Celebrate Father’s Day




WASHINGTON, D.C. – On Monday, June 21, President Obama will celebrate Father’s Day and discuss the importance of responsible fatherhood and mentoring to build healthy families and communities.    
More details will be provided on this event as they become available.
